pr_title: mgmt, keyvault refactor, avoid GET when list keys/secrets

timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: The change looks good. One question is for the secret version. When the customer want to get value for enabled secret, I think .getSecret(name, version) should have version param passed too. Not sure if I missed any part, but it seems it alwarys pass NULL as per your changes.
replies.author: xseeseesee

timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.message: set value to null if secret is disabled
